BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Landmarks Preservation Commission designation no. DL - 354, LP - 2153, pursuant to §3020 of the New York City Charter, concerning the designation of the The Wilbraham and its related site , located at 1 West 30th Street (aka 282-284 Fifth Avenue, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3, as a landmark.  (Non-ULURP no. 20045688 HKM).

Landmarks Preservation Commission designation no. DL - 354, LP - 2146, pursuant to §3020 of the New York City Charter, concerning the designation of the The Hecla Iron Works Building and associated site , located at 100-118 North 11th Street, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 33, as a landmark.  (Non-ULURP no. 20045689 HKK).
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to civil penalties for failure to maintain landmark or historic district improvements.
Items.MatterName: Allowing civil penalties for neglect of a landmark site or a site within a historic district.
